title: Lowest Nitrous Oxide Emissions Reduction
description: North Korea achieved a significant reduction in nitrous oxide emissions, with a 67.13% decrease from 1990 levels as of 2023.

title: Lowest Data Use Score
description: In 2023, North Korea scored just 10 out of 100 in the Statistical Performance Indicators for data use, indicating minimal utilization of data.

title: Poor Regulatory Quality
description: North Korea's regulatory quality was estimated at -2.39 in 2023, reflecting significant challenges in governance and regulation.

title: Low Immunization Rates for Children
description: In 2023, only 16% of one-year-old children in North Korea received the HepB3 vaccine, and the same percentage of children aged 12-23 months were immunized with DPT.

title: Limited Rural Sanitation Services
description: As of 2022, only 1.23% of North Korea's rural population had access to safely managed sanitation services.

title: High Female Labor Force Participation
description: In 2024, 86.98% of females aged 15-64 in North Korea participated in the labor force, indicating strong female workforce engagement.

title: High Overall Labor Force Participation
description: North Korea's total labor force participation rate was 88.996% in 2024, one of the highest globally.

title: Minimal Child Marriage Rates
description: In 2017, only 0.1% of women aged 20-24 in North Korea were married by age 18, indicating low prevalence of child marriage.

title: Low Unmet Need for Contraception
description: As of 2017, only 6.6% of married women aged 15-49 in North Korea had an unmet need for contraception.

title: Minimal Import Volume and Value
description: In 2021, North Korea's import volume index was 8.55, and the import value index was 10.16, indicating low levels of imports.

title: High Dependence on Regional Imports
description: In 2023, 97.10% of North Korea's merchandise imports came from low- and middle-income economies in East Asia & Pacific.

title: Minimal Export Activity
description: North Korea's export volume index was 1.90, and the export value index was 3.16 in 2021, reflecting limited export activity.

title: Low Voice and Accountability
description: In 2023, North Korea's voice and accountability estimate was -1.98, indicating restricted civil liberties and political rights.
